title: New: Courtney Marie Andrews – May Your Kindness Remain
body:
Took me a couple of listens to get under the skin of this latest track from **Courtney Marie Andrews**, but once I did, I was absolutely hooked.

A real emotional slower burner, _May Your Kindness Remain_ is an ode to seeing the good in people – there’s a real purity and tenderness to it. Check it out below, lifted from an album of the same title, out 23 March via Loose in the UK / Europe and Fat Possum / Mama Bird Recording Co. in the USA.
